name: Antivirus Sniper
description:
Created solo using Unreal Engine 4 for Cowboy's 100 Dollar Game Jam.  The theme was Only One Matters.

Antivirus Sniper is a 3D identification sniper game.  You're given a room of robots with varying colors, hats, and model numbers as well as a description of the target.  You need to identify and eliminate the target before time runs out to succeed.  The faster you do so the higher score you get.

My game fits the them in that only one of the robots in the crowd matters.  You're meant to figure out which one and eliminate them.  Also you only have one shot because that's all you need.

STORY

In the far future robots live among humans.  A deadly computer virus has broken out which eventually will cause any infected robots to indiscriminately attack humans.  The only way to stop the virus from spreading is to the put the infected robots down.  

You, a trained sniper, have been hired to eliminate known infected robots.  You've been given a list of descriptions, use this to identify the single infected robot among each group.  You only have a short while to identify and eliminate the target before it spreads the infection.  Be careful, you only have a single shot.

CONTROLS / GAMEPLAY

The goal is to shoot the robot in the crowd of robots that match the given description.  Use your mouse to aim and left-click to fire.  You only have one shot however, and there is only one target.  Missing or hitting the incorrect robot will result in failure.

CONTROLFUNCTIONDESCRIPTIONMouse Look / AimAim your sniper. Left-Click ShootDestroy tiles, activate red detonators.
